screenReaderInformation.withTitle: Keyboard interactive chart, titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart. Pressing TAB takes you to the chart area.
screenReaderInformation.withTitleAndType: Keyboard interactive {{ CHART_TYPE }} chart, titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart. Pressing TAB takes you to the chart area.

line.withSingleSymbol: This is a line chart with a single line.
line.withMultipleSymbols: This is a line chart with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} lines.

point.withSingleSymbol: This is a point chart with a single point.
point.withMultipleSymbols: This is a point chart with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} points.

bar.withSingleSymbol: This is a bar chart with a single bar.
bar.withMultipleSymbols: This is a bar chart with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} bars.

axis.withLabelAndDirectionAndTicks: This chart has a {{ AXIS_DIRECTION }} axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}, with a range that starts with {{ START_TICK }} and ends with {{ END_TICK }}.
axis.withLabelAndDirection: This chart has a {{ AXIS_DIRECTION }} axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}.
axis.withLabelAndTicks: This chart has an axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}, with a range that starts with {{ START_TICK }} and ends with {{ END_TICK }}.
axis.withLabel: This chart has an axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}.

controller.label: {{ CHART_TITLE }}. {{ CHART_SUBTITLE }}. Navigate into the chart area by pressing ENTER.

withSymbolType.empty: {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. {{ SYMBOL_TYPE }} {{ GROUP_POSITION }} of {{ N_SIBLINGS }}. Empty group.

withMembers.containsGroups: {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. {{ SYMBOL_TYPE }} {{ GROUP_POSITION }} of {{ N_SIBLINGS }}. Group that contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} groups.

containsSymbols.line: {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. {{ SYMBOL_TYPE }} {{ GROUP_POSITION }} of {{ N_SIBLINGS }}. Group that contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive lines.
containsSymbols.point: {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. {{ SYMBOL_TYPE }} {{ GROUP_POSITION }} of {{ N_SIBLINGS }}. Group that contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive points.
containsSymbols.bar: {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. {{ SYMBOL_TYPE }} {{ GROUP_POSITION }} of {{ N_SIBLINGS }}. Group that contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive bars.

containsSymbols.line: Group {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. Contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive lines.
containsSymbols.point: Group {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. Contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive points.
containsSymbols.bar: Group {{ GROUP_LABEL }}. Contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive bars.

containsSymbols.line: This chart contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive lines.
containsSymbols.point: This chart contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive points.
containsSymbols.bar: This chart contains {{ N_MEMBERS }} interactive bars.
